org.eodisp.ui.common.base
Interface UiConfiguration

All Superinterfaces:
org.eodisp.util.configuration.Configuration
All Known Implementing Classes:
MmGuiConfiguration, RmGuiConfiguration, SmGuiConfiguration
public interface UiConfiguration
extends org.eodisp.util.configuration.Configuration

This interface specifies a set of methods that each configuration for a UI application in the EODiSP framework should implement.

Version:
$Id:$
Author:
eglimi

Method Detail

getViewStateEntry

java.lang.String getViewStateEntry()

Returns the path to the file as string that will hold the state of the root window. This file can be used to store and restore the layout of the views.

Note that the path is not resolved whatsoever. You need to ensure that the path is correct. Most probably by creating a file like: 

 File file = new File(RootApp.getConfigurationDir(), UiConfiguration.getViewStateEntry());

Returns:
The file used to store the layout of the root window.

setViewStateEntry

void setViewStateEntry(java.lang.String file)
Sets the file that will store the state of the root window.

Parameters:
file - The path to the file as String that will store the state of the root window.
